name: user-admin-messaging-user-frontend
description: User interface for user-admin messaging application

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/*.css dist/
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && node ../scripts/deploy-frontend.js user dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && node ../scripts/deploy-frontend.js user staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && node ../scripts/deploy-frontend.js user prod
